group_1.narration: Wonder if he would notice@me if I were just 20cm taller...

group_1.textCenter: *Giggle*
It's done... Heck yeah, it's done!
There are two chemistry experiments@popular among the kids...
"How to use baking soda to clean your room."
And "How to make aerated chocolate."
I used that as a guide to make this...
The ultimate Valentine's chocolate for @that special person!
I shall call it... Science Chocolate No.14!
And with this, on Wednesday!
The ranks of the successful await...

group_1.textRight: So let me get right to the conclusion...@Sorry, not interested!

group_1.textCenter: Last time, I faced the obstacle headlong,@only to smash apart in disgrace...
I thought the direct approach was the@surest way to appeal to that guy's heart...
(I'm not gonna make the same mistake@twice, no way.)
(But how am I supposed to give it to him @indirectly...)
What to do...

group_1.narration: This isn't going to be easy...

group_1.textRight: Big deal. I woulda gone and given it to him.
You never know, maybe trying it again might@be the kicker, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: I wish I could be so small-minded!

group_1.textRight: Well, like, if you just keep overthinking@everything, when're ya gonna do it?

group_1.textLeft: I'm overthinking this for a reason.
I don't want to make the same mistake again!

group_1.textRight: Uh but, it is what it is! I don't see any @probs at all!
I mean, you're Myako-senpai! You're the@cutest girl, like a lil' critter!
Your stats are, like, uber high?
[chara:300601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]You totally make people happy just by being@around?

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]Stop blabbering on like I'm some cat or...@I don't know, a hamster! Idiot!
Urgh... Okay, this's just getting dumb now.
Whatever! I'll do it out of spite!
[chara:300301:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Drop my theory armor and go empiricommando!@Another direct attack is the only way!

group_1.textRight: Oh right, tomorrow I'll be, like...you know?
â€”bringing chocolate to Akira-chi and some@others. So I was thinkin'...
For reals, why doncha join us?

group_1.textLeft: If I agree to go with you, that'll mean I'm@admitting defeat...
I'll pull this off and establish an@anniversary date of gettin' a life!

group_1.textCenter: (It's Valentine's Day tomorrow...)
(Current status: Still no plan...)
(I'm antsy... I can't afford to be antsy...)
[chara:300301:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Heck yeaaah! Time for a breakthrough, Hinano@Miyako!
[chara:300301:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]A Witch...?
Huh... I guess it was nothing.
